title:

attachments.displayName:
ITEM CODE # 230; WINDOW CUT OVER LAY GIRTH.

Best Price USD 72.00 + Shipping USD 18.00.
Combine Shipping discounts also offered.

Use of contrast colour leather makes this girth very admirable. The anatomic shape of this girth enables the horse to move freely. Considerable freedom for the horse movement is supported by the deeper cut around the elbow and better pressure on the horse's chest.

The Stainless Steel buckles have rollers and are fixed onto three layers of elastic at both ends for equal pressure distribution and easy tightening. This girth has a central and two D-rings at each end to make it easy fitting.

Available Length: 110 cm (43"), 115 cm (45"), 120 cm (47"), 125 cm (49"), 130 cm (51"), 135 cm (53"), 140 cm (55"), 145 cm (57").

Available in Black, Oak Bark (Reddish Brown) or Havana (Brown) Shade.

Visit our website www.royalsports88.com.
or contact us equestrian@royalsports88.com
